doc.title: Family Makes You Nuts: The Making of 'It Runs in the Family'
doc.plot: This made-for-DVD documentary details the work that went into the production of It Runs in the Family, a story of reconciliation between members of a dysfunctional family of New Yorkers. Film fans are treated to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of this work that brought together Kirk, Mike and many other members of the Douglas family, as well as to interviews with the director and cast members, who give their insights into the efforts that were needed to bring this project to completion.
